pullRequest.title: [Code style] Cleanup tests: Simplify assertEquals to assertTrue or assertFalse
pullRequest.bodyText:
Simplifies JUnit assertions with assertEquals() where the expected parameter is true or false, replacing them with assertTrue() or assertFalse().
Also simplifies assertEquals() with null parameter (assertions against null) by replacing the function with assertNull().

commit.message:
Cleanup tests: Simplify assertEquals with boolean to assertTrue or assertFalse

Signed-off-by: Paul Vogel <pavog@users.noreply.github.com>

nodes.bodyText: Oh and use Java style array syntax instead of C style array syntax.
